WorkPlace.Name: NEOGRID TECHNOLOGIES ApS
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription:
Neogrid Technologies er etableret i 2011 med henblik på at kommercialisere viden opnået gennem deltagelse i en række forsknings og demonstrationsprojekter.

Med baggrund i videnskabelige teknologier udvikler vi intelligente visualiserings-, styrings- og overvågningsteknologier, der automatisk analyserer og sparer energi i store og små bygninger.

HiringOrg.Name: NEOGRID TECHNOLOGIES ApS
HiringOrg.OrganizationDescription:
Neogrid Technologies er etableret i 2011 med henblik på at kommercialisere viden opnået gennem deltagelse i en række forsknings og demonstrationsprojekter.

Med baggrund i videnskabelige teknologier udvikler vi intelligente visualiserings-, styrings- og overvågningsteknologier, der automatisk analyserer og sparer energi i store og små bygninger.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Does sustainable energy trigger your interest? Do you have experience with IT architecture, databases and both frontend and backend?

We are expanding our team and are looking for a skilled Full Stack Developer to reinforce our Software Development Team. We are a company working on the leading-edge of new services and technologies to support the green transition. In this regard, we are looking for the right candidate to help further develop our platform and support our operations, to deliver services within energy savings, flexibility and thermal comfort in buildings. We offer an agile environment, with a shot decision-making process, where you can have an impact.

Key focus areas and tasks:

The tasks are diverse and you are going to be responsible within many disciplines, from concept development, coding, test and implementation, both within the backend and frontend development. Your primary focus areas will be:

  • System architecture
  • Data modelling
  • Backend development
  • Frontend development on our web app
  • Server maintenance

Appreciated skills and qualifications:

We are looking for an employee who has experience in software development, it doesn’t matter if you’re newly graduated or have years of experience within your field, as long as you are motivated to help us develop technologies for future sustainable energy systems. Ideally, you have experience with multiple of the following areas, but we do not expect you to have experience within all areas.

  • Programming in Java
  • Experience with Spring framework and OSGi framework
  • Experience with the following technologies: Redis, PostgreSQL, ActiveMQ or related messaging systems
  • Frontend development in Typescript using the AngularJS
  • Development in Linux environments

About you:

  • You are highly passionate about your profession
  • You are curious, willing to learn, grow new skills and reach out to others
  • You have a structured way of working and see test and documentation as an embedded part of your work
  • You are a qualified engineer or have achieved equivalent practical experience
  • You are fluent in English (both written and spoken). Danish at a professional level is appreciated but not necessary

We offer:

We offer a challenging job with excellent professional and personal development opportunities. We have a strong entrepreneurial culture, where you have the opportunity to have an impact on both the organization and your tasks, inside the scope of our duties. You can expect to join a great team, with highly skilled colleagues and an informal and flexible working environment, with the option to work from home.

About Neogrid:

Neogrid Technologies was established in 2011. Based on scientifically sound methods and state of the art technologies, we develop intelligent visualization, control and monitoring technologies that support energy efficiency, flexibility and comfort in buildings. We are today running commercially, with a 24/7 control, in more than 350 buildings with more than 10.000 apartments. We are 14 people working at Neogrid, and together we are working towards a more sustainable future.

Application and additional information:

The employment is a full-time position. We want the positions filled as soon as possible.  
For additional information about the position, please contact Project Coordinator Cecilie Vagnholdt Pedersen +45 2069 4732 or cvp@neogrid.dk.

Send your motivation letter, resume and diploma to career@neogrid.dk as soon as possible. We review applications on an ongoing basis, and close the position once we have found the right candidate.  

We look forward to hearing from you.
